review: It's really great. Love the recommendations you get after watching a movie. HD color is also good. Only thing that stopped me from giving a five star rating is the buffering on netflix. Sometimes it can be flat out annoying, other times it's not an issue. Hope they will come up with a fix. Other than that, it's well worth the money.
author: Floridaboy

review: It's a bit slow and seems to have no difference performance wise from the added power. It has consistent network issues and has now completely stopped connecting. (going to send in for warranty and hope that solves it) Has a great selection of apps, and such, but can't seem to run them as they are really made for the full size unit, not the stick.
author: Ethan M.

review: This is so easy to watch our favorite movies on Prime and Netflix.
author: Marguerite Mead

review: Wish I had been using for years.  Much simpler to install and use than I anticipated (anxiety was unfounded).  Can't believe all I get for the small purchase price.  Just love everything about this and have been telling family and friends all over the country, especially those who do not have cable, to get this.
author: Gordon F.

review: It's wonderful. It's so easy, and works really well. I'd recommend it to anyone!
